scripts.clean: rm -rf node-modules/ && rm -rf app/node_modules/ && rm -rf website/node_modules && rm yarn.lock
scripts.install:all: concurrently "yarn workspace @beep/app install" "yarn workspace @beep/api install" "yarn workspace @beep/website install"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "yarn workspace @beep/app start" "yarn workspace @beep/api dev" "yarn workspace @beep/website start"
